\ 

This short course looks at the basics of the R programming language to get you up and running on R.

Find out more about R from the [official website](https://www.r-project.org/about.html).


\


### Installing R

To install R go to [the R project website](https://www.r-project.org/).

To install RStudio go to [the R Studio website](https://www.rstudio.com/)

More information on installation can be found on the [Getting Started Page](https://another-goodman.github.io/R-boot-camp/Getting-Started.html). 

\


### What is covered in the Bootcamp? 

* Basic Installation
* R and R Studio 
* R Basics
* Vectors, Factors and Dataframes
* Importing Data
* Inspecting Data

\
